name: Rogue Robot (mich)
description:
For Benbonk Game Jam #4

Push boxes onto buttons to open doors, keep away from security lights, don't keep secret documentation away from the public, and ruin a companies net worth... all at once!

play other people's games, rating starts on Friday! https://itch.io/jam/benbonk-game-jam-4/entries

MINOR SPOILERS!

press control on the select level screen to see the true ending, this is mostly for debug
